comments: Good teacher. Strong writing background made this class a cakewalk, really. She was helpful and clear.
Good teacher. I found the course to be pretty easy, but I did learn a few things I hadn\'t known before, and enjoyed the homework. Very helpful with questions.

Mary was great and always helpful. I am taking her again for BT111. This class was all out of the book. Weekly reading, homework due on Fridays. Do the work, study and you can get an A. Same goes for BT111.
Excellent and caring teacher. As long as you show her you are trying she will do what ever she can to help you succeed. Wish more instructors were like her.
Mary is very kind and helpful! I enjoy all of her classes! She likes to give extra credit! She is a little loopy sometimes, but its funny!
Odd, smart, helpful, kind, informative, worth your time.
